verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH935>, When you come into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>; (this is the land <WH776> that shall fall <WH5307> unto you for an inheritance <WH5159>, even the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> with the coasts there <WH1367>:)

Then your south <WH5045> quarter <WH6285> shall be from the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> along by the coast <WH3027> of Edom <WH123>, and your south <WH5045> border <WH1366> shall be the outmost coast <WH7097> of the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220> eastward <WH6924>:

And your border <WH1366> shall turn <WH5437> from the south <WH5045> to the ascent <WH4608> of Akrabbim <WH4610>, and pass on <WH5674> to Zin <WH6790>: and the going forth <WH8444> there shall be from the south <WH5045> to Kadesh <WH6947>–barnea, and shall go on <WH3318> to Hazar <WH2692>–addar, and pass on <WH5674> to Azmon <WH6111>:
And the border <WH1366> shall fetch a compass <WH5437> from Azmon <WH6111> unto the river <WH5158> of Egypt <WH4714>, and the goings out <WH8444> of it shall be at the sea <WH3220>.
And as for the western <WH3220> border <WH1366>, you shall even have the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> for a border <WH1366>: this shall be your west <WH3220> border <WH1366>.
And this shall be your north <WH6828> border <WH1366>: from the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> you shall point out <WH8376> for you mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>:

From mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> you shall point out <WH8376> your border unto the entrance <WH935> of Hamath <WH2574>; and the goings forth <WH8444> of the border <WH1366> shall be to Zedad <WH6657>:
And the border <WH1366> shall go on <WH3318> to Ziphron <WH2202>, and the goings out <WH8444> of it shall be at Hazar <WH2704>–enan: this shall be your north <WH6828> border <WH1366>.
And you shall point out <WH184> your east <WH6924> border <WH1366> from Hazar <WH2704>–enan to Shepham <WH8221>:

And the coast <WH1366> shall go down <WH3381> from Shepham <WH8221> to Riblah <WH7247>, on the east side <WH6924> of Ain <WH5871>; and the border <WH1366> shall descend <WH3381>, and shall reach <WH4229> unto the side <WH3802> of the sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> eastward <WH6924>:

And the border <WH1366> shall go down <WH3381> to Jordan <WH3383>, and the goings out <WH8444> of it shall be at the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>: this shall be your land <WH776> with the coasts <WH1367> there round about <WH5439>.

And Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, This is the land <WH776> which you shall inherit <WH5157> by lot <WH1486>, which the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to give <WH5414> unto the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH4294>, and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294>:

For the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7206> according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, and the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1425> according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH2677>; and half the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159>:

The two <WH8147> tribes <WH4294> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159> on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho <WH3405> eastward <WH6924>, toward the sunrising <WH4217>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
These are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> which shall divide <WH5157> the land <WH776> unto you <WH499>: Eleazar the priest <WH3548>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.
And you shall take <WH3947> one <WH259> prince <WH5387> of every tribe <WH4294>, to divide <WH5157> the land <WH776> by inheritance <WH5157>.
And the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> are these <WH4294>: Of the tribe of Judah <WH3063>, Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>.
And of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>, Shemuel <WH8050> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin <WH1144>, Elidad <WH449> the son <WH1121> of Chislon <WH3692>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835>, Bukki <WH1231> the son <WH1121> of Jogli <WH3020>.
The prince <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>, for the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, Hanniel <WH2592> the son <WH1121> of Ephod <WH641>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669>, Kemuel <WH7055> the son <WH1121> of Shiphtan <WH8204>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074>, Elizaphan <WH469> the son <WH1121> of Parnach <WH6535>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485>, Paltiel <WH6409> the son <WH1121> of Azzan <WH5821>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>, Ahihud <WH282> the son <WH1121> of Shelomi <WH8015>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321>, Pedahel <WH6300> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>.
These are they whom the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to divide the inheritance <WH5157> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.
